name: Rey's Scavenger Run
description:
Hello and welcome to "Rey's Scavenger Run", a "The Force Awakens" fan-project:

You play Rey on her speeder and have to pick up electronic gargabe while avoiding vehicles in your way.
Press 'X' to start the game and use the arrow keys to control the vehicle.

Outstanding Pico-8 adaption of Rey's Theme by Chris D. (@gruber_music).

Windows, Linux und Mac executables can be downloaded here

I am looking forward to your feedback and suggestions.
Thanks,
Tassilo

This game is not endorsed by Lucasfilm Ltd., Twentieth Century Fox or Disney and is intended for entertainment purposes only.
